summary_text: Yuki Hase befriended a lonely girl classmate when he notices that she's always alone. Upon knowing the girl, he found out a serious matter about her that can either make him put a space between them, or make them closer to each other.

summary_text: Returning to her hometown, a renowned photographer encounters the man who broke her heart.

name: C Kkompany
summary_text: Three down on their luck men adapts a strategical idea of extortion, only to find themselves in deep trouble.

name: DAU. Natasha
summary_text: Natasha works in the canteen of a secret Soviet research institute. She drinks a lot, likes to talk about love and embarks on an affair. State security intervenes. A tale of violence that is as radical as it is provocative.

name: Kings of South Beach
summary_text: Based on the true story of a Miami Beach nightclub owner who takes a young employee under his wing, while trying to avoid bankruptcy and the mafia.

name: Afsana Dilwalon Ka
summary_text: A young schoolteacher falls for her distant relative from a village but his singing talent catches the eye of a selfish mother-daughter duo who separate the budding lovers.

name: Muhammad Ali: The Whole Story
summary_text: Muhammad Ali is the best fighter!

name: Waiting Alone
summary_text: Chen Wen, an antique shop worker and aspiring author, who has just met the girl of his dreams. The only problem is that she only wants him as a very close friend, not as a boyfriend.

name: Chan sam ying hung
summary_text: Jack and Martin are members of rival Chinese triads in the middle of a gang war. Both of their gang leaders like to get advice from a fortune teller living in Thailand. On one such trip, ...                See full summary »

name: Xtro 3: Watch the Skies
summary_text: Marines travel to a deserted island to diffuse bombs, only to be terrorized by a deadly alien creature.

name: The Godfather Family: A Look Inside
summary_text: A documentary chronicling the making of all three films in the Godfather trilogy.

name: Laura, les ombres de l'été

name: The Horsemen
summary_text: Drama depicting rural life in contemporary Afghanistan and the Afghani people's love for an ancient traditional sport similar to horseback polo.

name: Prehistoric Women
summary_text: Jungle guide David Marchand is kidnapped by a tribe of natives who want to sacrifice him to their white rhino god. Just as he's about to be killed, however, he is thrown backwards in time ...                See full summary »

summary_text: Working girl Janie is proposed to by a conservative car salesman, a bohemian auto mechanic, and a millionaire playboy and must make a choice.

name: Dachra
summary_text: An investigation into witchcraft leads a trio of journalism students to a mysterious town marked by sinister rituals. Inspired by true events.

name: A Joyous Christmas
summary_text: A young self-help author returns to her hometown during the Christmas holidays to promote her new book. She soon discovers the true meaning of Christmas and family.

name: The Crooked Man
summary_text: Olivia returns home after six years, and a string of unusual deaths leads her to believe that she's being haunted by a mysterious force from her childhood.

name: Domain
summary_text: After a deadly virus wipes out most of humanity, the survivors are forced to wait in self-sustaining bunkers with a networked video interface for communication, but one by one, they start mysteriously disappearing.

name: Atlantis: End of a World, Birth of a Legend
summary_text: Tells the story of the greatest natural disaster of the ancient world, an event that experts believe inspired the legend of Atlantis.

name: Wir können nicht anders
summary_text: A man foils an attempted murder, then flees the crew of would-be killers along with their intended target as a woman he's just met tries to find him.

name: Pethaino gia sena!
summary_text: Zoe,a devoted mother and wife, decides to leave behind her boring routine and fulfill her sexual urges. But nothing goes according to plan.

name: Minor Premise

name: Night and Day
summary_text: In the summer of 2007 a painter in his forties travels to Paris to escape arrest for smoking marijuana, leaving his wife behind in Korea. While there he meets an ex-girlfriend and is introduced to a small community of Korean artists.

summary_text: Performed live at the Neptune Theater in Seattle, Washington, Jimmy O. Yang covers hilarious interactions with immigrant parents, his thoughts on Matt Damon, and whether ghosts will haunt one-bedroom apartments.

name: The Bare Necessity
summary_text: Captain Pierre Perdrix's life has been turned upside down since the enigmatic Juliette Webb burst into his life. Her presence alone will force his tight-knit family to redefine their boundaries and finally begin to fully live their lives.

name: Knots
summary_text: A male-centric take on contemporary relationships, where three guy friends look for love and commitment. One of them gets seduced by a vamp who ends up stealing his wife away from him.

name: Madonna: The Girlie Show - Live Down Under
summary_text: Madonna and her crew perform in Australia for The Girlie Show Tour in 1993 in support of the legendary Erotica album. She wouldn't perform there for another 23 years due to scheduling.

name: Belorusskiy vokzal
summary_text: An emotionally persuasive drama describing the friendship of four World War II veterans, their sudden reunion after 25 years and the subsequent effect of this occasion upon their thoughts and evaluations of the past and present.

name: A.P.E.X.
summary_text: In postapocalyptic war-torn 2073, a scientist from another timeline must help a resistance group stop the army of indestructible A.P.E.X. terminator robots he'd mistakenly created, even if it means risking erasing himself from existence.

name: Pink Floyd: Delicate Sound of Thunder
summary_text: A documentary of the tour for Pink Floyd's "delicate Sound of Thunder".

summary_text: An astronaut and his android double travel back to the time of King Arthur.

name: Born to Be Bad
summary_text: An immoral mother blackmails a wealthy businessman after he accidentally hits her delinquent son with his truck.

name: Bizarre
summary_text: A French teenager gets a job at the burlesque club Bizarre in New York.

name: Homies
summary_text: After they accidentally get involved in a messy drugs conflict, four inept roommates need to sell 22 kilos of cocaine within a week to square things with the Russian mobsters they now owe money.

name: Toxin

name: Prayanam
summary_text: A boy meets a girl in an airport and falls in love with her, but he has only 2 hours to convince her.

name: Tobruk
summary_text: Set in the Libyan Desert in WW2 a battalion of Czech soldiers face the siege of Tobruk.

name: Body sob 19
summary_text: A boy has reoccurring nightmares about a beautiful girl being cruelly murdered, but everyone around him tries to convince him that the girl is only a figment of his imagination.

name: Liverpool
summary_text: A merchant sailor returns to his home in Tierra del Fuego after spending most of his life at sea.

name: Nada sô sô

name: David Copperfield
summary_text: A gentle orphan discovers life and love in an indifferent adult world.

name: Yvonne's Perfume
summary_text: How the life of Victor Chmara toppled during the course of a single day during the summer of 1958 ?

name: Barracuda

summary_text: A runaway bride and an undercover reporter get caught up in political intrigue as they lead a merry chase across Europe and uncover a spy plot.

name: Not So Dumb
summary_text: Not-so-smart chatterbox Dulcy Parker does and says all the wrong things, but they right themselves to prove she's not so dumb after all.

name: Holiday for Heroes
summary_text: The plot revolves around a woman (Egan) and a soldier (Blucas) who exchange letters for a year before their worlds collide.

name: Lahoriye
summary_text: Love story which revolves across borders

name: Earthrise
summary_text: Humanity now lives on Mars. Each year a small number are sent back to aid in it's rehabilitation. We follow three individuals as they go home for the first time.

name: Antikaci
summary_text: Love who you love, when you can, while you can, as much as you can.

name: We'll Take Manhattan
summary_text: A look at the love affair between 1960s supermodel Jean Shrimpton and photographer David Bailey.

name: Ismael
summary_text: An 8-year-old boy tracks down his father.

name: Incognito
summary_text: This offbeat musical drama stars Lucas (Bénabar), an up-and-coming singer ready to do anything to be on top of the French pop scene.

name: Sheep Without a Shepherd
summary_text: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

name: Miao Miao

summary_text: The Mexican guerilla leader Tepepa and his gang fight against the chief of police, Cascorro.

summary_text: The daughter of a psychotic magician must stay in his mansion for seven nights in order to inherit his fortune.

summary_text: An international team embarks on an expedition to the moon in an uncommonly spacious rocketship. There they encounter a faceless alien intelligence who conclude that the human race is too ...                See full summary »

summary_text: A friendly visitor from outer space warns against conducting experiments with the Earth's magnetic field, that could mutate insects into giant monsters.

summary_text: Aspiring junior lifeguards compete against snobby local kids for bragging rights and the ultimate tower at Malibu Beach, Calif.

name: The Big Trip
summary_text: A goofy stork mistakenly delivers a baby panda to the wrong door. A bear, a moose, a tiger and a rabbit set on an arduous but fun filled adventure through wilderness to return the panda to its rightful home.

summary_text: The Chennai Sharks XI team goes to Theni for the marriage of their teammate Ragu, and get into a tiff with the local team that becomes a threat to the wedding.

summary_text: A young lord and his demon butler board a luxury cruise ship to investigate claims of the dead being returned to life, and are faced with various complications.

summary_text: An imaginative woman copes with a debilitating form of cancer by remaining optimistic and spending time with her friends.

name: Death Fighter

name: Codebreaker
summary_text: The highs and lows of Alan Turing's life, tracking his extraordinary accomplishments, his government persecution through to his tragic death in 1954. In the last 18 months of his short life...                See full summary »

name: Dharm
summary_text: When a priest's wife brings home an orphan boy, her husband is against it. Over time, he develops a connection with him, but is shocked when he finds out the boy's religion.

name: Knife Edge
summary_text: A successful Wall Street trader returns to England with her new husband and five-year-old son, but their new start together turns into a nightmare when they move into a country house which contains a terrible secret.
